originContent: A replacement for the default docker-ps that tries really hard to fit within your terminal width.
translatedContent: 一个替代默认 docker-ps 的工具，努力适配你的终端宽度。

originContent: By default, my `docker ps` output is really wide and every line wraps around into three.
translatedContent: 默认情况下，我的 `docker ps` 输出非常宽，每行会换行成三行。

originContent: This (obviously) breaks the tabular display and makes everything chaotic.
translatedContent: 这（显然）破坏了表格显示，使一切变得混乱。

originContent: *(This gets especially bad if one container has multiple port mappings, and they are all displayed in a single row)*
translatedContent: *（如果一个容器有多个端口映射，并且都显示在同一行时，这种情况尤其糟糕）*

originContent: It doesn’t look like we’ll get improved output in the foreseeable future (see [moby#7477](https://github.com/moby/moby/issues/7477)), so I decided to make my own drop-in replacement.
translatedContent: 看起来在可预见的未来不会有改进的输出（参见 [moby#7477](https://github.com/moby/moby/issues/7477)），所以我决定做一个自己的替代方案。

originContent: - All normal commandline flags/options from docker-ps work *(almost)* the same.
translatedContent: - 所有 docker-ps 的普通命令行标志/选项 *(几乎)* 一样。

originContent: - Write multi-value data (like multiple port mappings, multiple networks, etc.) into multiple lines instead of concatenating them.
translatedContent: - 将多值数据（如多个端口映射、多个网络等）写入多行，而不是连接在一起。

originContent: - Add color to the STATE and STATUS column (green / yellow / red).
translatedContent: - 给 STATE 和 STATUS 列添加颜色（绿色 / 黄色 / 红色）。

originContent: - Automatically remove columns in the output until it fits in the current terminal width.
translatedContent: - 自动删除输出中的列，直到适应当前终端宽度。

originContent: - sort the output with the `--sort` argument
translatedContent: - 通过 `--sort` 参数对输出排序

originContent: - Enter watch mode with the `--watch` argument
translatedContent: - 通过 `--watch` 参数进入监视模式
相比默认 docker-ps 的更多改动：

originContent: - Show (by default) the container-cmd without arguments.
translatedContent: - 默认显示容器命令但不带参数。

originContent: - Show the ImageName (by default) without the registry prefix, and split ImageName and ImageTag into two columns.
translatedContent: - 默认显示镜像名称时去掉注册表前缀，并将镜像名称和标签拆分成两列。

originContent: - Added the columns IP and NETWORK to the default column set (if they fit)
translatedContent: - 默认列集添加了 IP 和 NETWORK 列（如果适合的话）

originContent: - Added support for a few new columns (via --format):
translatedContent: - 通过 --format 支持了几个新列：

originContent: - Added options to control the color-output, the used socket, the time-zone and time-format, etc (see `./dops --help`)
translatedContent: - 添加了控制颜色输出、使用的 socket、时区和时间格式等选项（参见 `./dops --help`）

originContent: - Download the latest binary from the [releases page](https://github.com/Mikescher/better-docker-ps/releases) and put it into your PATH (eg /usr/local/bin)
translatedContent: - 从[发布页面](https://github.com/Mikescher/better-docker-ps/releases)下载最新二进制文件并放入你的 PATH（例如 /usr/local/bin）

originContent: - You can also use the following one-liner (afterwards you can use the `dops` command everywhere):
translatedContent: - 你也可以使用以下一行命令（之后你可以在任何地方使用 `dops` 命令）：
- 或者您可以使用 AUR 包之一（在 Arch Linux 下）：

originContent: - Alternatively you can use one of the AUR packages (under Arch Linux):
translatedContent: * https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/dops-bin （将 `dops` 安装到您的 PATH 中）
* https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/dops-git （将 `dops` 安装到您的 PATH 中）
- 将 docker ps 命令别名为 `dops`（参见[下面章节](#usage-as-drop-in-replacement)）

originContent: - Alias the docker ps command to `dops` (see [section below](#usage-as-drop-in-replacement))
Output on a medium sized terminal

translatedContent: 您可以通过在 `.bashrc` / `.zshrc` 中创建一个 shell 函数来完全替代 docker ps...

originContent: You can fully replace docker ps by creating a shell function in your `.bashrc` / `.zshrc`...
This will alias every call to `docker ps ...` with `dops ...` (be sure to have the dops binary in your PATH).
translatedContent: 这将把所有对 `docker ps ...` 的调用别名为 `dops ...`（确保 dops 二进制文件在你的 PATH 中）。

originContent: If you are using the fish-shell you have to create a (similar) function:
translatedContent: 如果你使用的是 fish-shell，你需要创建一个（类似的）函数：

originContent: By default dops tries to be "intelligent" and find the best output format for your terminal width.
translatedContent: 默认情况下，dops 会尝试“智能”地根据你的终端宽度选择最佳输出格式。

originContent: The current output formats (= table columns) are defined in the [options.go](https://github.com/Mikescher/better-docker-ps/blob/master/cli/options.go).
translatedContent: 当前的输出格式（即表格列）定义在 [options.go](https://github.com/Mikescher/better-docker-ps/blob/master/cli/options.go) 中。

originContent: The first format that fits in your terminal width is used.
translatedContent: 第一个适合你终端宽度的格式将被使用。

originContent: But you can also override it by supplying a `--format` parameter. If you supply more than one `--format` parameter the first one that fits your terminal is used (same logic as with the default ones...)
translatedContent: 但你也可以通过提供 `--format` 参数来覆盖它。如果你提供多个 `--format` 参数，则会使用第一个适合你终端的（与默认格式的逻辑相同……）

originContent: Normally only simple columns aka `{{.Status}}` are supported.
translatedContent: 通常只支持简单列，也就是 `{{.Status}}`。

originContent: But you can also use the full golang template syntax (e.g. `{{ printf "%.15s" .Command }}`).
translatedContent: 但你也可以使用完整的 golang 模板语法（例如 `{{ printf "%.15s" .Command }}`）。

originContent: In this case it can be useful to specify the column header by prefixing it with a colon (`SHORTENED NAME:{{ printf "%.10s" (join .Names ";") }}`)
translatedContent: 在这种情况下，可以通过在前面加冒号来指定列标题（例如 `SHORTENED NAME:{{ printf "%.10s" (join .Names ";") }}`）

originContent: The following functions are defined in these templates (plus the [default go functions](https://pkg.go.dev/text/template)):
translatedContent: 以下函数在这些模板中定义（加上 [默认的 go 函数](https://pkg.go.dev/text/template)）：

originContent: You can also configure some/most of the options via a configuration file.
translatedContent: 你也可以通过配置文件配置部分或大部分选项。

originContent: Place a TOML formatted file in `$HOME/.config/dops.conf` / `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/dops.conf`.
translatedContent: 将一个 TOML 格式的文件放置在 `$HOME/.config/dops.conf` / `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/dops.conf`。
- 过滤器 (= 字符串数组)
- 排序方向 (= 字符串数组)
dops [选项]                       列出 docker 容器
--all , -a                     显示所有容器（默认只显示运行中容器）

originContent: --all , -a                         Show all containers (default shows just running)
translatedContent: --filter <ftr>, -f <ftr>       根据提供的条件过滤输出

originContent: --filter <ftr>, -f <ftr>           Filter output based on conditions provided
translatedContent: --format <fmt>                 使用 Go 模板美化打印容器信息

originContent: --format <fmt>                     Pretty-print containers using a Go template
translatedContent: --last , -n                    显示最近创建的 n 个容器（包含所有状态）

originContent: --last , -n                        Show n last created containers (includes all states)
translatedContent: --latest , -l                  显示最新创建的容器（包含所有状态）

originContent: --latest , -l                      Show the latest created container (includes all states)
translatedContent: --no-trunc                     不截断输出（例如容器ID、Sha256 镜像引用、命令行）

originContent: --no-trunc                         Don't truncate output (eg ContainerIDs, Sha256 Image references, commandline)

translatedContent: 额外选项（`docker ps` 中不存在）：

originContent: Options (extra | do not exist in `docker ps`):
--timezone                         Specify the timezone for date outputs
translatedContent: --color <true|false>          启用/禁用终端颜色输出
--socket <文件路径>            指定 docker socket 位置（默认：`auto` - 调用 docker CLI 自动确定 socket）

originContent: --socket <filepath>                Specify the docker socket location (Default: `auto` - which calls the docker cli to determine the socket)
translatedContent: --timeformat <go-time-fmt>     指定日期时间输出格式（Go 语言语法）

originContent: --timeformat <go-time-fmt>         Specify the datetime output format (golang syntax)
--no-header                        Do not print the table header
translatedContent: --simple-header               不打印表头下的分割线

originContent: --simple-header                    Do not print the lines under the header
translatedContent: --format <fmt>                可指定多个格式，终端宽度适配时使用第一个合适的格式

originContent: --format <fmt>                     You can specify multiple formats and the first one that fits your terminal widt will be used
translatedContent: --sort <列>                   按指定列排序，使用与 --format 中相同的标识，仅对表格格式有效

originContent: --sort <col>                       Sort output by a specific column, use the same identifier as in --format, only useful together with table formats
translatedContent: --sort-direction <ASC|DESC>  排序方向，仅与 --sort 配合使用有效

originContent: --sort-direction <ASC|DESC>        The sort direction, only useful in combination with --sort
translatedContent: --watch <间隔>, -w <间隔>     自动定时刷新输出（间隔可选，默认：2秒）

originContent: --watch <interval>, -w <interval>  Automatically refresh output periodically (interval is optional, default: 2s)
{{.CreatedAt}}                     Time when the container was created.
{{.RunningFor}}                    Elapsed time since the container was started.
translatedContent: {{.RunningFor}}                    容器启动以来经过的时间。

originContent: {{.Ports}}                         Published ports. ([!] differs from docker CLI, these are only the published ports)
translatedContent: {{.Ports}}                         发布的端口。([!] 与 docker CLI 不同，这里仅指已发布的端口)

originContent: {{.Labels}}                        All labels assigned to the container.
translatedContent: {{.Labels}}                        分配给容器的所有标签。

originContent: {{.Mounts}}                        Names of the volumes mounted in this container.
translatedContent: {{.Mounts}}                        挂载在此容器中的卷名称。

originContent: {{.Networks}}                      Names of the networks attached to this container.
translatedContent: {{.Networks}}                      连接到此容器的网络名称。

originContent: Available --format keys (extra | do not exist in `docker ps`):
translatedContent: 可用的 --format 键（额外的 | docker ps 中不存在）：
{{.ImageName}}                     镜像 ID（不含标签和注册表）

originContent: {{.LabelKeys}}                     All labels assigned to the container (keys only)
translatedContent: {{.LabelKeys}}                     分配给容器的所有标签（仅键）
{{.ShortPublishedPorts}}           发布的端口，较 {{.Ports}} 输出更短

originContent: {{.LongPublishedPorts}}            Published ports, full output with IP
translatedContent: {{.LongPublishedPorts}}            发布的端口，带 IP 的完整输出

originContent: {{.PublicPorts}}                   Only the public part of published ports
translatedContent: {{.PublicPorts}}                   仅发布端口中的公共部分
